lead_paragraph: The mood toward the iPad, at least reflected in Monday’s reading list of the tech reporters and editors of The New York Times, is a bit less kindly. Luckily, there are smartphones and Facebook.

headline.main: What We’re Reading: Tear Down, Return or Blend the iPad
